ygData.subject: Re: Pottery's Last Use (spoiler, natch)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... only one market to sell to, Rogues. (Kind of like Fletching s limited market, only worse.) It s worse than that actually.  I roleplay a good (though
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:42 AM 07/29/1999 -0000, you wrote:
>From: PRIMEhero@...
>
>As seen with the recent posting of the poison formulas a Master Potter has
only one market to sell to, Rogues. (Kind of like Fletching's limited
market, only worse.)

It's worse than that actually. I roleplay a good (though slightly mad)
character... what the hell would I be doing selling poison vials?

Oh, the vial recipe was posted to EQ_Potters a couple of days ago by Donald
Taber. Here's the recipe:


----


From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>

OK, since people who announce they know something but are not telling annoy
me, I will send out the formula for everyone. I made multiple vials and will
list
my skill levels below:

Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt - I have succeeded with Black Wolf Skin,
Puma Skin, Grizzley Skin, Low Qual Bear Pelt,
Med Qual Cat Pelt, High Qual Cat Pelt
Vial Sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet

Lined Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt
Lined Vial sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet (?)
